config.question: In 1794, farmers in western Pennsylvania protested a federal excise tax, passed by the Congress in 1791, on __________.

answer_3.response: Farmers in western Pennsylvania protested a federal excise tax on distilled whiskey that Congress had passed in 1791. They made a good deal of money distilling their grain into whiskey, and the excise tax threatened to put them out of business.

answer_2.response: Farmers in western Pennsylvania protested a federal excise tax on distilled whiskey that Congress had passed in 1791. They made a good deal of money distilling their grain into whiskey, and the excise tax threatened to put them out of business.
